outputs.output_descr: Project title: Enhanced Accountability and Improved Check and Balance

Project title: State Enhancement for Improved Governance project
Project goal: is aimed at facilitating better governance in Tajikistan in order to reduce poverty, unlock human potential, protect human rights and enhance core functions of the state.

Full project title: Developing Capacity for Corruption Awareness Raising and Risk management in Government and CSOs;
Project goal: to strengthen the corruption prevention capacity in the ASFCFAC and the integrity of the education sector

project_descr: Preservation of peace and conflict prevention through capacity development in human rights education
